page.title: 07INDUSTRY AND TRANSPORT
page.content: Shell Haven and Coryton oil refineries dominate the area in terms of size, but not in employment.A wide range of smaller companies in the manufacturing and service sectors, especially the latter, offer job possibilities.The making of clothes and window units, car repair and haulage, are some examples. Even so, many people have jobs in London, as Stanford lies on the Tilbury rail loop, which is connected to the main Fenchurch St.- Shoebury line. The A13 Southend to London road and the A1014 'Manorway' are the major roads.The A1014, which is dual carriageway, was built to link the refineries with the A13. Previously, heavy tankers had to go through central Stanford, a slower and potentially more dangerous journey.
